items.name: Verdant Dragon
items.description: A majestic dragon with emerald scales that dwells in ancient forests.
items.details: The Verdant Dragon is known for its symbiotic relationship with forest ecosystems. These creatures help spread seeds and maintain healthy vegetation patterns.

items.name: Crystalline Fern
items.description: A glowing fern with crystal-like fronds.
items.details: Found only in caves with high mineral content. The crystals on its leaves emit a soft bioluminescence that guides travelers.
